source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeNumber in the target exists but the same Pers_No doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_local_planning_authority_fact table -- merge
-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.lpa_code IS NULL
        THEN T3.LPAID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS LPAID, -- surrogate key
    T1.lpa_code                     AS LPACode,
    T1.lpa_name                     AS LPAName,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.lpa_code, '.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.lpa_name, '.')
        ))                          AS RowID, 
    'Y'                             AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_local_planning_authority T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact T3 ON T1.lpa_code = T3.LPACode AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.lpa_code = T3.LPACode AND 
            md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa_code,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa_name, '.')
                )
            )  <> T3.RowID     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.LPAID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y'
    AND T1.lpa_code IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_local_planning_authority)
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    LPAID, -- surrogate key
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    LPAID, -- surrogate key
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact
WHERE LPACode IN (SELECT LPACode FROM casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new WHERE LPAID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_local_planning_authority_fact_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    LPAID,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.casework_local_planning_authority_fact is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact AS Target
USING casework_local_planning_authority_fact_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.LPAID = Target.LPAID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        LPAID,
        LPACode,
        LPAName,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.LPACode,
        Source.LPAName,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.casework_local_planning_authority_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_local_planning_authority_fact

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LPAID NULLS LAST) AS LPAID,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact;
